alert.note: Alert for Craig; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 12:20AM CST until February 27 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1219 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Commerce, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Commerce... Quapaw... Picher... Cardin... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 309 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
